GSD.product_version: versions from v4.6 to before v4.9.273
GSD.description:
usb: fix various gadgets null ptr deref on 10gbps cabling.

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.9.273 by commit beb1e67a5ca8d69703c776db9000527f44c0c93c, it was introduced in version v4.6 by commit eaef50c760576bca70b87fdc26eb87a3660529f8. For more details please see the references link.
